dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Carbofuran is a carbamate pesticide currently one of the most toxic pesticides on the market. Because birds may die from accidentally eating granular carbofuran pesticides the US Environmental Protection Agency only allows this product to be sold in liquid form. In addition starting from 2009 the US Environmental Protection Agency ordered a ban on any agricultural products containing residues of this product for human consumption whether domestically produced or imported. Carbofuran is a carbamate insecticide and nematicide. It was created by the United States in 1963 and promoted in 1967. The pure product is a white crystal with a solubility of 700ppm in water at 25°C and is relatively stable under neutral and acidic conditions but unstable under alkaline conditions and the hydrolysis speed increases with the increase of pH value and temperature.

呋喃丹是一种氨基甲酸酯类农药，目前是市场上最有毒的农药之一。由于鸟类可能会因误食颗粒状呋喃丹农药而死亡，美国环保署只允许以液体形式销售此产品。此外，从2009年开始，美国环保署下令禁止任何含有此产品残留物的农产品供人类食用，无论是国内生产的还是进口的。呋喃丹是一种氨基甲酸酯类杀虫剂和杀线虫剂。它由美国在1963年创造并在1967年推广。纯品是一种白色晶体，在25°C时水中的溶解度为700ppm， 在中性和酸性条件下相对稳定，但在碱性条件下不稳定，水解速度随着pH值和温度的增加而增加。
